explanation_text:
Sol.
Option A: True

Option C: True
If L is recursively enumerable Language, then for all member strings of L, the TM of L will halt within 
finite time. If 
L

L

which halts within finite time. Thus 
L

Option D:

Complement of CFL is a CSL in the worst case which is Recursive.
